content:
20 Years. A Legacy Forged in Semicolons and Sleepless Nights.
Now, I’m opening a new chapter with ‘Vibe Coding’. This is an era where Intuition (The Vibe) becomes the language, transcending complex syntax. This new rhythm makes an old developer leap like a young coder experiencing the first rush of programming love.
Armed with deep technical insight and, admittedly, ‘rusty yet occasionally useful ideas,’ I charge forward like Don Quixote tilting at the windmills.
The apps and utilities I create are the evidence of this quest. I am not stuck in the past; I am writing a New Classic (Legacy) with new methods.
Add Fresh Vibes and Unwavering Trust to Your Digital Journey.

Cho Sungryong S/W Engineer & Creator of Gabi Apps Hello, I’m Hercoolvery of Gabi Apps. #For nearly 20 years, I’ve delved into the profound world of databases and system software, passionately dedicated to creating stable and efficient software. Exploring the intricate internals of complex technologies, understanding their structures, and designing better systems has always been a great joy for me.
Now, leveraging my extensive experience and technical depth, I am embarking on a new journey under the name Gabi Apps to introduce my own applications to the world. My goal is not just to provide functional apps, but to consistently release ‘well-crafted’ applications on the App Store that seamlessly integrate into users’ daily lives and add significant value.
Gabi Apps pursues the following values:
Robust Technology: Building a solid foundation, even in unseen areas, to provide stability that users can always trust. User-Centric: Believing that technology ultimately serves people, we evolve by listening to our users’ voices. Continuous Growth: We will not settle for what we’ve built, but will continuously grow through regular updates and new challenges. This space is dedicated to documenting Gabi Apps’ products, technology, and journey of growth. I look forward to connecting with you more through this platform.
Join me and Gabi Apps on this exciting journey.

This page provides a detailed overview of my professional experience, skills, and background in the software industry.
Experiences #Gabi Apps, Chief Creator # I plan apps, utilities, and services, and develop them using Vibe Coding. I primarily use SwiftUI for app development and also provide development consulting services and conduct small-scale lectures.
Altibase, R&D Lead # Responsible for leading the HDB v7.5 development project, establishing a long-term product roadmap, and managing organizational change and HR planning.
ArkData, Head of Seoul R&D Center (Tech Lead) # Led the development of ACE (ArkData Common Extractor), managed the project roadmap, and was responsible for hiring and building the engineering team at the Seoul R&D Center.
ArkData, Director / Development Team Lead # Led the ACE project and developed a pilot program for transaction extraction using the Tibero Log Interface (TLI). Authored and reviewed technical blog posts.
CUBRID, Principal Engineer / Team Lead # Led the development of the CTC (CUBRID Transaction Capture) prototype, funded by NIPA. Built and managed a development team over 1.5 years, established development roadmaps, and led key projects for CUBRID 11.0, including a major TRUNCATE performance improvement.
Altibase, Principal Engineer # Played a key role in developing software for distributed transaction processing, including NDS (Network Distributed System), DB-Link, Cluster, and Sharding. Focused on transaction and storage management modules.
TGL, Inc. (Japan), R&D Engineer # Developed and maintained GUI controller programs for semiconductor manufacturing equipment (spinners), primarily using MFC.
LG Electronics Inc., R&D Engineer # Developed and maintained the SMS module for 2.5G GSM mobile phones (RTOS / Embedded).
Skills # Leadership & Planning: Long-term and short-term roadmap planning, HR strategy, team building, project planning, and scheduling. Project Management: Experienced in the full software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering and design to implementation, testing, and documentation. Core Technologies: C, C++, Linux, vi, svn, git, shell. Domains: Distributed DBMS, Change Data Capture (CDC), DDS, System Software, Transaction Processing. Publications # Book: 개발자 리부트 - May 2022 Paper: VSkyline: Vectorization for Efficient Skyline Computation - ACM SIGMOD Record, Dec 2010 Paper: 데이터 환경의 변화와 분산 데이터베이스 시스템 (Changes in Data Environments and Distributed Database Systems) - KIISE, May 2012 Education # M.S. in Computer Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University (2011) B.S. in Business Administration, Sungkyunkwan University (2000)
